description: Police name a pedestrian who died following a collision with a tractor and a car in the Lake District.
title: Elaine Steele named as Troutbeck Bridge tractor crash victim
title_page: Elaine Steele named as Troutbeck Bridge tractor crash victim - BBC News
maintext:
Published
8 February 2015
Police have named a pedestrian who died following a collision with a tractor and a car in the Lake District.
Elaine Steele, 59, from Oxenholme, was pronounced dead at the scene of the incident on the A591 at Troutbeck Bridge, near Windermere, on Friday.
The male drivers of both the tractor and the car were not seriously injured.
The family of Ms Steele, who worked at a Windermere holiday park, described her as a "kind and soft-hearted woman" who would "do anything for anyone".
A police investigation into the crash is continuing.
